A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ill conceived and poorly executed\, The Last Jedi is the most ridiculous movie since Battlefield Earth and the greatest franchise killer since Batman & Robin. Utterly mystified as to how this movie was released and think Rian Johnson needs to ask Santa Claus for a screenwriting book next Christmas or ask Kathleen Kennedy to send him to a McKee seminar or something because this film is so poorly written\, one could be forgiven for thinking they were watching a parody.  As a female\, I find nothing even remotely interesting or \"empowering\" about Rey and consider her to be nothing more than a Disney Princess. Strong female characters have arcs.  Think of Ellen Ripley and Sarah Conner -  Both incredible creations and amazing characters. Now think of Rey... Pretty underwhelming isn't it?
